skills.name: game/progression/singleplayer/skills/combat/skill_barricade1
skills.locDescription:
Deploys a temporary energy barricade that will boost shield regeneration for everyone who takes cover behind it. Upgraded versions provide additional combat bonuses for allies.

Activation requires one power cell from Barricade's limited power cell supply.

skills.locDescription: Increases weapon damage and accuracy by 15% for all allies (including the user) behind the barricade.

skills.locDescription: Increases power damage and force by 30% for all allies (including the user) behind the barricade.

skills.name: game/progression/singleplayer/skills/combat/skill_barricade6_regeneration
skills.locDescription: Greatly reduces shield regeneration delay for all allies (including the user) behind the barricade.
